textContent:
I hope and pray that you never feel the need to come here, but we're humans and we come across certain moments where we feel like giving up even on  things that  mattered the most to us at a point of time. 
I want to remind you that you're much capable of handling things on your own, you've always had! Things would definitely fall into place, just like you used to say "dua aur sabr" toh bs yahi yaqeen rakho sab thik ho jayega! 

Also, any person or letter can't just perform a miracle and boom you start feeling better but yes God definitely can! So try to grow closer to Him. 
There's a Bible verse in the book of Revelation that says "What He opens, no one can shut", so whatever has made you feel that burdened if it has a role to play in your life, then things will definitely work out, trust me! And if not me, then trust God! 

Know that I love you and no matter what I'll be there to listen to you! ðŸ©·

I want to remind you that you're much capable of handling things on your own, you've always had! Things would definitely fall into place, just like you used to say "dua aur sabr" toh bs yahi yaqeen rakho sab thik ho jayega! 


Also, any person or letter can't just perform a miracle and boom you start feeling better but yes God definitely can! So try to grow closer to Him.
